title: Classic Fragrances 4 Pack Assorted Aromas Bundle - Air Freshener Spray - For Home, Vehicles, Clothes, Fabrics – Long Lasting Smell, Portable Spray Can – Deodorise & Neutralise Odours – 125ml
features: CLASSIC FRAGRANCES - FRESHEN UP YOUR SPACE - Classic Fragrances Assorted Aromas Air Freshener Sprays Bundle portable mini cans. Classic Cherry is a deliciously juicy sweet cherry delight. Ocean Breeze contains sea salt, fresh air and a hint of the ocean. New Ride contains the powerful and aromatic scent of new car leather. Tutti Fruity is fun, fresh and zesty, and is full of fruity aromas. Classic Fragrance cans are the perfect way of freshening up your space. This bundle contains 1 x Classic Fragrances Sweet Cherry, 1 x Ocean Breeze, 1 x New Ride and 1 x Tutti Frutti Air Fresheners.

PORTABLE MINI CANS - NEUTRALISE ODOURS ON THE GO - Instantly eradicates and deodorises odours, including hard-to-remove smells like curry or smoke. These handy portable pocket-sized mini air freshener sprays for your home, car or office are only 125ml meaning that they are both perfect for a post-cleaning spritz or to fragrance your clothes, furniture or footwear but can also be carried around on the move in your handbag, gym or sports bag to freshen up on the go.

LIFE IS GOOD - EVERYTHING SMELLS AMAZING! - Our Classic Fragrances neutralise odours and smells on almost everything. This air freshener spray sanitises and instantly refreshes your surroundings. Our air fresheners work in both your cars and vehicles as a car air freshener, as well as your home as a bathroom air freshener, on fabrics, carpets, furniture like curtains and sofas, and even on your footwear and clothing! Spray once for a delicate yet daring scent that will make you feel like you’ve set foot in a new home or car.

EASY TO USE - LONG LASTING FRAGRANCE - For best use shake well before use then hold the bottle upright and spray it over a large area. Allow fragrance to settle for a few minutes before returning to enclosed spaces. Do not spray directly onto solid surfaces. Protect the environment and recycle this product when empty. This product is for use as an air freshener and not a multi-purpose product.

SUPPORT A PROUD UK BRAND - Designer Fragrances was established in 2019 in Manchester by Asiffa and Shiraz. Designer Fragrances has created something unique in the spray market that combines long-lasting fragrances and much-loved scents to eliminate odours everywhere. Designer Fragrances also champions climate-friendly CFC-free products and you can also recycle the can after use.
description: Product Description Classic Fragrances Assorted Aromas Air Fresheners Sprays 4 Pack – 125ml Long-lasting quick-release spray air freshener. Classic Fragrance cans are the perfect way of freshening up your space. Classic Cherry - Deliciously juicy sweet cherry delight. Ocean Breeze - Contains sea salt, fresh air and a hint of the ocean. New Ride - Powerful and aromatic scent of new car leather. Tutti Fruity - Fun, fresh and zesty, and is full of fruity aromas. Bundle Contents 1 x Classic Fragrances Sweet Cherry Air Freshener 1 x Classic Fragrances Ocean Breeze Air Freshener 1 x Classic Fragrances New Ride Air Fresheners 1 x Classic Fragrances Tutti Frutti Air Freshener Use Anywhere on Everything Our Classic Fragrances neutralise odours and smells on almost everything. This air freshener spray sanitises and instantly refreshes your surroundings. Our air fresheners work in both your cars and vehicles as a car air freshener, as well as your home as a bathroom air freshener, on fabrics, carpets, furniture like curtains and sofas, and even on your footwear and clothing! Spray once for a delicate yet daring scent that will make you feel like you’ve set foot in a new home or car. Variety of Aromas Available The Classic Fragrances Mini Cans are available in several other fragrances inspired by modern fragrances: Sweet Cherry, Tutti Frutti, Ocean Breeze and New Ride. Directions for Use For best use shake well before use then hold the bottle upright and spray it over a large area. Allow fragrance to settle for a few minutes before returning to enclosed spaces. Do not spray directly onto solid surfaces. Protect the environment and recycle this product when empty. This product is for use as an air freshener and not a multi-purpose product. Ingredients Cherry - Fruit - Salt - Leather
